body.name: AMERROBIL Vibration Massage Office Chair, Reclining Office Chair with Footrest, Home Desk Chair with Armrest, Adjustable Height/Tilt, 280lb Capacity, Black
features: 💞【Massaging Office Chair with vibration points】- The massage office chair with vibrating, reclining, and swivel functions. vibration points help you relieve the pressure on the lower back with vibration(Only vibration function, not kneading). The massage office chair comes with an upgraded control panel, easy to operate.

💞【Reclining Office Chair, Built For Comfort】- The height of the reclining office chair can be adjusted from 17 to 22 inches and the reclining angle from 90 to 155 degrees. Just pull up the handle under the office chair seat, and you will get a comfortable recliner for relaxing in your spare time. The office chair with massage vibration is suitable for work and study, maximising your performance at home or in the workplace.

💞【Sturdy & Durable Massaging Office Chair】- Reclining office chair has a heavy-duty nylon base, provides you with superior stable support, and a maximum weight capacity of up to 280 lbs. The high-back office chair easily swivels 360 degrees providing freedom of movement and the convenience of communicating with others. Get the maximum use of your workspace without strain, which is suitable for your office or home.

💞【Easy to Assemble and Maintain 】- The high back office chair comes with straightforward instructions and components, and only takes you 10-15mins approximately to assemble. During daily maintenance, wipe with a clean cloth or special fabric cleaner to remove surface dust.

💞【The Best Deal You Will Find 】- Every purchase is an important investment for you, including the feeling of the body, the life of the product, and the money out of pocket. We provide 1* VALUE-FOR-MONEY OFFICE CHAIR, 1*90 DAYS FREE RETURN AND REPLACEMENT. All problems that are faced can be solved.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SIT ON COMFY!! AMERROBIL Reclining Office Chair A professional office chair, Enjoy every moment of sitting down. Learn More

ENJOY EVERY MINUTE OF YOUR WORKING TIME OR GAME PLAYING. The luxurious upholstery combined with the soft armrest gives an essence of leisure. Upgrade the image of your office or your home with a AMERROBIL home office chair.

FULLY ADJUSTABLE OFFICE CHAIR Our executive office chair comes with a 90-155° back adjustment and a seat adjustment feature, plus a lock mechanism that allows you to sit back when you feel exhausted. Mechanism control makes it easier to rock back in your chair and easily lie down to have a nap,360 degrees swivel, height adjustable, and flexible to adjust your favourite position.

The Most Ergonomic Desk Chair For Your Office Does Exist! Heavy duty metal base The heavy-duty five-star base enables the chair to hold up to 280lb Retractable footrest The office chair is designed with a retractable footrest. Gently pull it out and lie down during a busy workday to rest or take a quick nap Soft cushion The seat cushion, armrests and footrest are all filled with high resilience sponge, providing soft but supportive sitting feeling. Remote control Office chair has a separate remote control can control the mode of vibration massage, simple and easy to operate

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice basket- not navy
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this basket in navy. The first one arrived and was black. Thought it might have been a shipping error so I exchanged it and got the exact same one the second time. Super fast turn around on the exchange.It's a nice basket, wide but not too deep. You can fit 3 20' couch pillows in it, which is what I got it for. It's sturdy too. Stands up well on its own. Sad it doesn't match my living room. -1 star for wrong color.
